entity.name: stdlib
entity.description: stdlib is a standard library with an emphasis on numerical and scientific computation, written in JavaScript (and C) for execution in browsers and Node.js. It provides robust, high-performance libraries for mathematics, statistics, data processing, streams, and more.

projects.name: stdlib
projects.description: A standard library for numerical and scientific computing in JavaScript, providing data structures and algorithmic building blocks for data analysis, statistical computing, and machine learning.

channels.description: Support stdlib through Open Collective with one-time or recurring contributions.
Support stdlib through GitHub Sponsors with one-time or recurring contributions.
